title: Calculate DPS reuse and end of pipe from raw entity data — anlz_dps_entity
Calculate DPS reuse and end of pipe from raw entity data — anlz_dps_entity
text: pth path raw entity data skip number lines skip raw entity data sep separator raw entity data

title: Calculate DPS reuse and end of pipe from raw entity data — anlz_dps_entity
text: data frame loading data TP, TN, TSS, BOD tons per month hydro load million cubic meters per month

title: Calculate DPS reuse and end of pipe from raw entity data — anlz_dps_entity
text: Indput data include flow million gallons per day, conc mg/L.  Steps include: Multiply flow day month get million gallons per month Multiply flow 3785.412 get cubic meters per month Multiply N flow divide 1000 get kg N per month Multiply m3 1000 get L, divide 1e6 convert mg kg, dividing 1000 TN DPS reuse multiplied 0.3 land application attenuation factor (70%) TP, TSS, BOD  dps reuse multiplied 0.05 land application attenuation factor (95%) Hydro load (m3 / mo) also attenuated reuse, multiplied 0.6 (40% attenutation)

title: Calculate DPS reuse and end of pipe from raw entity data — anlz_dps_entity
code: pth <- system.file('extdata/ps_dom_hillsco_falkenburg_2019.txt', package = 'tbeploads') anlz_dps_entity(pth) #> # A tibble: 24 × 10 #>     Year Month entity  facility source tn_load tp_load tss_load bod_load hy_load #>    <int> <int> <chr>   <chr>    <chr>    <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl> #>  1  2019     1 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.13   0.134     0.307    0.709   0.435 #>  2  2019     2 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.04   0.177     0.220    0.440   0.391 #>  3  2019     3 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.10   0.101     0.202    0.454   0.416 #>  4  2019     4 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   0.704  0.0672    0.127    0.626   0.321 #>  5  2019     5 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.06   0.120     0.212    0.745   0.520 #>  6  2019     6 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.14   0.112     0.217    0.658   0.563 #>  7  2019     7 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.55   0.157     0.275    0.864   0.712 #>  8  2019     8 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.81   0.230     0.287    1.14    0.868 #>  9  2019     9 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.31   0.125     0.174    0.878   0.565 #> 10  2019    10 Hillsb… Falkenb… DPS -…   1.27   0.212     0.205    0.990   0.642 #> # ℹ 14 more rows
